ThingDef.label: ursine genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of ursine genetic material. Can be used at the genepod to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. Can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

ThingDef.label: avian genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of avian genetic material. Can be used at the genepod to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. Can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

ThingDef.label: colossal genome
ThingDef.description: A payload of colossal genetic material. Can be used at the genepod to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. Can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

ThingDef.label: mechanoid active components
ThingDef.description: A vial of active mechanites from a mechanoid's corpse.

ThingDef.label: non-specialized genome
ThingDef.description: This vial of genetic material contains non-specialized cells that can't be used to create animal hybrids. They can probably be used in a gene recombinator to turn them into more useful genetic materials, though.

ThingDef.label: ruined genome
ThingDef.description: This genetic material is ruined. Useless, though some merchant may pay a pittance for the glass shards.
